Variable.name: TEMP
Variable.Description: Mean daily temperature converted to degrees C to tenths. Missing = NA

Attributes.Attribute: Number of observations used in calculating mean daily temperature

Variable.name: DEWP
Variable.Description: Mean daily dew point converted to degrees C to tenths. Missing = NA

Attributes.Attribute: Number of observations used in calculating mean daily dew point

Variable.name: SLP
Variable.Description: Mean sea level pressure in millibars to tenths. Missing = NA

Attributes.Attribute: Number of observations used in calculating mean sea level pressure

Variable.name: STP
Variable.Description: Mean station pressure for the day in millibars to tenths. Missing = NA

Attributes.Attribute: Number of observations used in calculating mean station pressure

Variable.name: VISIB
Variable.Description: Mean visibility for the day converted to kilometres to tenths. Missing = NA

Attributes.Attribute: Number of observations used in calculating mean daily visibility

Variable.name: WDSP
Variable.Description: Mean daily wind speed value converted to metres/second to tenths. Missing = NA

Attributes.Attribute: Number of observations used in calculating mean daily wind speed

Variable.name: MXSPD
Variable.Description: Maximum sustained wind speed reported for the day converted to metres/second to tenths. Missing = NA

Variable.name: GUST
Variable.Description: Maximum wind gust reported for the day converted to metres/second to tenths. Missing = NA

Variable.name: MAX
Variable.Description: Maximum temperature reported during the day converted to Celsius to tenths–time of max temp report varies by country and region, so this will sometimes not be the max for the calendar day. Missing = NA

Attributes.Attribute: Blank indicates max temp was taken from the explicit max temp report and not from the ‘hourly’ data. An “*” indicates max temp was derived from the hourly data (i.e., highest hourly or synoptic-reported temperature)

Variable.name: MIN
Variable.Description: Minimum temperature reported during the day converted to Celsius to tenths–time of min temp report varies by country and region, so this will sometimes not be the max for the calendar day. Missing = NA

Attributes.Attribute: Blank indicates max temp was taken from the explicit min temp report and not from the ‘hourly’ data. An “*” indicates min temp was derived from the hourly data (i.e., highest hourly or synoptic-reported temperature)

Variable.name: PRCP
Variable.Description: Total precipitation (rain and/or melted snow) reported during the day converted to millimetres to hundredths; will usually not end with the midnight observation, i.e., may include latter part of previous day. A value of “.00” indicates no measurable precipitation (includes a trace). Missing = NA

Attribute.name: PRCP_ATTRIBUTES
Attribute.Value: Summation of 2 reports of 6-hour precipitation amount
Summation of 3 reports of 6-hour precipitation amount
Summation of 4 reports of 6-hour precipitation amount
Summation of 2 reports of 12-hour precipitation amount

Station reported ‘0’ as the amount for the day (e.g. from 6-hour reports), but also reported at least one occurrence of precipitation in hourly observations–this could indicate a trace occurred, but should be considered as incomplete data for the day

Station did not report any precipitation data for the day and did not report any occurrences of precipitation in its hourly observations–it’s still possible that precipitation occurred but was not reported

Variable.name: SNDP
Variable.Description: Snow depth in millimetres to tenths. Missing = NA

Variable.name: I_FOG
Variable.Description: Indicator for fog, (1 = yes, 0 = no/not reported) for the occurrence during the day

Variable.name: I_RAIN_DRIZZLE
Variable.Description: Indicator for rain or drizzle, (1 = yes, 0 = no/not reported) for the occurrence during the day

Variable.name: I_SNOW_ICE
Variable.Description: Indicator for snow or ice pellets, (1 = yes, 0 = no/not reported) for the occurrence during the day

Variable.name: I_HAIL
Variable.Description: Indicator for hail, (1 = yes, 0 = no/not reported) for the occurrence during the day

Variable.name: I_THUNDER
Variable.Description: Indicator for thunder, (1 = yes, 0 = no/not reported) for the occurrence during the day

Variable.name: I_TORNADO_FUNNEL
Variable.Description: Indicator for tornado or funnel cloud, (1 = yes, 0 = no/not reported) for the occurrence during the day

Variable.name: EA
Variable.Description: Mean daily actual vapour pressure as calculated using improved August-Roche-Magnus approximation (Alduchov and Eskridge 1996). Missing = NA

Variable.name: ES
Variable.Description: Mean daily saturation vapour pressure as calculated using improved August-Roche-Magnus approximation (Alduchov and Eskridge 1996). Missing = NA

Variable.name: RH
Variable.Description: Mean daily relative humidity as calculated using improved August-Roche-Magnus approximation (Alduchov and Eskridge 1996). Missing = NA
